Kyle, I don't want to seem mean but when you did that poll it wasn't 
kind.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Please... LN didnt deserve this...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Sorry I've been doing my best.  I just wanted
> > something funny to say and that sounded pretty funny
> > to me.  I might try a little harder if you would be
> > willing TO SAY ONE NICE THING ABOUT ME!  JUST ONE
> > ("you have only been here for a relitively short time"
> > and such things don't count)!
> > 
> > --- Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > > Down with LN? I'm nice and quiet and still I get
> > > bashed? Something tells me 
> > > that someone needs to grow up.
